```{r, fig.height=5,fig.width=5}
library(leaps)
library(magrittr) # makes the pipe %>% work
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(reshape2)

cars<-read.csv("data1.csv")
price.model<-lm(MSRP~., data=cars)

par(mfrow=c(2,2))
summary(price.model)
plot(price.model)
```
